channel.title: Sealed Traits on Learning Publicly
channel.description: Recent content in Sealed Traits on Learning Publicly

item.title: Sealed Traits in Scala
item.description: A sealed trait in scala forces all the case classes/objects that wish to extend it to be in the same source file. In other words, if case class B wishes to extend sealed trait A B has to be defined in the same file where trait A is defined. Taking a little step back, What exactly is a trait? Traits in Scala Traits in scala are similar to interfaces in java.
